title: Weeding Brochure — wedding invitation gallery, customization requests, and contact page (frontend)

requirements.summary: Add global branding/layout for “Weeding Brochure” with responsive header/nav + footer and consistent typography/spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: Site title/branding displays “Weeding Brochure” in the header and in the document title
Layout is responsive for mobile and desktop
Header includes navigation links to at least: Gallery, Customize, Contact

file_operations.description: Update the base document <title> to “Weeding Brochure” (English) and ensure the HTML lang remains English.

Create the application shell and routing for Home, Gallery, Customize, and Contact, wiring navigation and per-route document titles. Use the build-template-react routing approach if present; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a responsive global layout with header/nav (links: Gallery, Customize, Contact) and footer, displaying “Weeding Brochure” branding and logo. Use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button) where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create global styles/Tailwind layers to enforce consistent typography, spacing, and base element styling across pages (English-only UI text).
Ensure App is correctly imported from the created frontend/src/App.tsx and that global styles (frontend/src/index.css) are applied.

requirements.summary: Build a gallery/catalog page showing invitation designs with thumbnails and a larger preview on selection (at least 8 static designs).
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery page shows a grid/list of invitation designs with thumbnails
Clicking/tapping a design opens a larger preview (modal or dedicated detail section/page)
At least 8 sample designs are available using static assets

file_operations.description: Add a static catalog of at least 8 invitation designs (id, design name, image paths) referencing generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated. Keep all user-facing text in English.

Implement the Gallery page rendering a responsive grid/list of invitation cards with thumbnail images and design names. Use shadcn-ui Card and Dialog (for preview modal) to support consistent UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a reusable preview modal/dialog that displays the selected design larger with its name/identifier. Use shadcn-ui Dialog for accessibility and behavior; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Gallery page into the app routing and ensure it is reachable from header navigation (no orphan pages).

requirements.summary: Create a Customize flow with an English form to submit invitation details and optional selected design association.
acceptanceCriteria: Customize page contains a form with fields for key wedding invitation details and a free-text requirements field
Customer can optionally choose a design from the gallery to associate with the request
All user-facing form labels, buttons, and validation messages are in English

file_operations.description: Implement the Customize page with an English-language form (names, date, venue, and a free-text requirements/notes field) and an optional design selector sourced from the static catalog. Use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small reusable design selector UI (optional selection) to associate a request with a gallery design; uses the static catalog list. Use shadcn-ui form primitives if available; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Customize page into routing and header navigation, ensuring English document title and consistent layout.

requirements.summary: Submit customization form data to the backend and display clear success/error states while preserving form input on failure.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form calls the backend and creates a stored request
On success, the UI shows a confirmation message and clears or resets the form
On failure, the UI shows an English error message and does not lose the entered data

file_operations.description: Create a small frontend service that calls the backend canister using the core-infrastructure backend connection configuration to submit customization requests (using backendInterface.submitRequest from frontend/src/backend.d.ts). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Connect form submission to the customizationRequests service; show an English success confirmation state on completion (and reset/clear the form), and show an English error message on failure while retaining entered values. Use shadcn-ui alert/toast patterns if present; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small UI component to render success and error states consistently for the Customize flow (English-only). Use shadcn-ui styling primitives if available; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create a Contact page for hardcopy requests showing “Gharpic designer owner” and phone number with click-to-call support.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page clearly shows: “Gharpic designer owner” and phone number “9824469590”
Phone number is a tel: link (click-to-call on supported devices)
Contact page is accessible from the header navigation

file_operations.description: Create the Contact page content (English) prominently showing “Gharpic designer owner” and the phone number “9824469590” as a tel: link for click-to-call on mobile.
Wire the Contact page into routing and ensure it is accessible via the header navigation links.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive wedding-brand theme (avoid blue/purple as dominant colors) and add a home hero section with CTA to the gallery.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across Gallery, Customize, and Contact pages
Primary palette avoids blue & purple as the dominant colors
Home page includes a hero section introducing wedding invitation cards and a call-to-action to view the gallery

file_operations.description: Implement the Home page with a hero section introducing wedding invitation cards (English) and a prominent call-to-action that navigates to the Gallery. Render the generated hero banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/weeding-brochure-hero.dim_1600x700.png.
Wire the Home page into routing as the default route and ensure hero CTA links to Gallery; keep navigation consistent across pages.

Define a warm, neutral wedding theme via CSS variables/Tailwind base styles (e.g., cream/blush/gold/sage accents) ensuring blue & purple are not dominant, and apply consistent styling to cards, buttons, and form elements.
Adjust/extend Tailwind theme tokens (using existing CSS variable strategy) to support the chosen warm neutral palette and consistent component styling across the site.

requirements.summary: Add and render the provided generated images as static frontend assets for the home hero and gallery (no backend image routing).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated
Gallery uses these static assets for thumbnails/previews
Home hero uses a generated banner image

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero banner image as a static asset at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/weeding-brochure-hero.dim_1600x700.png.
Add the generated wordmark/logo image as a static asset at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/weeding-brochure-logo.dim_512x512.png for use in header branding.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-01.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-02.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-03.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-04.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-05.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-06.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-07.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated invitation image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-08.dim_1200x800.png.
Ensure the Home hero renders the static banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/weeding-brochure-hero.dim_1600x700.png (no backend involvement).

Ensure the Gallery thumbnails/previews render the static invitation images from frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-01.dim_1200x800.png through frontend/public/assets/generated/invitation-08.dim_1200x800.png (no backend involvement).
Render the static logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/weeding-brochure-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header branding area.
